metadata.title: Syhood 2 Pieces Women's Fake Collar Detachable Blouse Dickey Collar Half Shirt Fake Collar Doll Collar for Lady
features: Package includes: 1 x white detachable collar with round collar, 1 x black false collar with pointed collar, simple, classic and easy-matching, which can meet your daily wearing needs, and also a nice gift for your family and friends

Reliable cotton material: these false collars are made of quality cotton fabric, skin-friendly and breathable, soft to touch and comfortable to wear; Machine washable, hand washable, which can also be applied with iron machine to iron out the wrinkles

One size fits most: this set of 2 half shirt false collars comes in one size, suitable for most people's head circumference; With elastic bands on both sides for adjusting and fixing, you can tighten or loosen it for a snug fit easily

Stylish and convenient design: these detachable blouse dickey collars have no sleeves, only the upper collar, designed with extended shoulder straps on both sides, allowing you to put your arms in and fix the false collar with a pin, easy to wear and take off, and the overall appearance looks very elegant and formal

Wide applications: this kind of semi shirt collar is very suitable for sweater, dress, uniform, jacket, T-shirt, shirt or other casual wear that won't have any problem even if you wear it to work, and can make you look more formal and impressive in the crowd
description: Features:  Comfortable to wear: Made from soft cotton fabric, these detachable blouse dickey collars are comfortable to wear and soft to touch, easy to wash and not fade. Versatile piece with any outfit for any season, also a wonderful gift for you and your family or friends.  Elegant fake collars: Both pointed collar and doll collar come with no sleeves design, which can be tucked under any dress, shirt, sweater, sweatshirt, cardigan, blouse and suit, making you look formal and elegant.  Specifications: Material: cotton Color: black, white  Package includes: 2 x Half shirt fake collars  Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors in size. The color may have slight differences due to different screens.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "7.87 x 7.87 x 0.39 inches; 3.53 Ounces", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "December 25, 2020"}
